name: POL_FLAG_1
description: Flag indicating antenna HH (0) or VV (1) polarisation

name: SUN_FOV
description: If set, Direct Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

name: SUN_GLINT_FOV
description: If set, Reflected Sun correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel. Sun correction is based on the Sea bi-static coefficients defined in the AUX_BSCAT ADF and computed for a fixed wind speed of 7 m/s and wind direction of 0 deg North

name: MOON_FOV
description: If set, Direct Moon correction has been performed during image reconstruction of this pixel

name: SINGLE_SNAPSHOT
description: If set, this scene has not been combined with an adjacent scene in opposite polarisation during image reconstruction to account for cross-polarisation leakage (it has been processed with only co- polar antenna patterns information)

name: SUN_POINT
description: If set, this pixel is located in a zone (circle around Sun alias position with radius configurable through Sun_Point_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P) where a Sun alias was reconstructed (if Sun removal is active, measurement may be degraded)

name: SUN_GLINT_AREA
description: If set, this pixel is located in a zone where Sun reflection has been detected using the bi-static scattering coefficient threshold defined in the configuration file

name: MOON_POINT
description: If set, this pixel is located in a zone where a Moon alias was reconstructed (after Moon removal, measurement may be degraded)

name: AF_FOV
description: If set, the pixel is inside the exclusive zone of Alias free (delimited by the six aliased unit circles)

name: BORDER_FOV
description: If set, the pixel is close to the border delimiting the Extended Alias free zone or to the unit circle replicas borders (also known as “suspenders and belts”). Distance threshold is configurable through FOV_Border_Flag_Size field in AUX CNFL1P

name: SUN_TAILS
description: If set, this pixel is located in the hexagonal alias directions centred on a Sun alias (if Sun is not removed, measurement may be degraded in these directions)

name: RFI_H_POL
description: If set, the analysis of the NIR Brightness Temperatures or System Temperatures standard deviation in H polarisation has reported this snapshot as an outlier of the expected trend, which is a clear indicator of the presence of one or more RFI sources in the data; that the Temperatures were saturated or in the vicinity of such saturation and there is a high probability that the measurement is affected

name: RFI_V_POL
description: If set, the analysis of the NIR Brightness Temperatures or System Temperatures standard deviation in V polarisation has reported this snapshot as an outlier of the expected trend, which is a clear indicator of the presence of one or more RFI sources in the data; that the Temperatures were saturated or in the vicinity of such saturation and there is a high probability that the measurement is affected

name: RFI_2
description: If set, the measurement is affected by point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (flag is set in a circle around the RFI position, with a radius dependant on the RFI expected BT defined in the AUX RFILST), or it has exceeded the threshold defined in BT_Dual/Full_RFI_Pixel_Flag_Threshold fields in AUX CNFL1P, or is negative for Dual Polarisation values

name: RFI_3
description: If set, the measurement is affected by the tails of a point source RFI as identified in the AUX RFI list (tail width is dependant on the RFI estimated BT (from each snapshot measurements) , corresponding to 0.16 of the radius of the RFI circle flagged)
